[px], about this afternoon class, please study by yourself first.
I have to deal with something.

I already put today's assignment and commissions
from people nearby on the Quest Board.

People entrust the Academy with all kinds of stuff. You can complete
commissions that match your abilities and accumulate experience.

Keep practicing. Easier to learn by practicing than simply
studying. I look forward to seeing your progress next time we meet.
